name: Round it! (by 8px, 10px, ...)
description:
Round all properties to the nearest multiplier of 8, 10, or your custom value! This is very useful when you are working with the 8px Grid, or other grid systems.


You can:

  • Round the height, the width, and also the X- and Y-position of anything you want (Rectangles, Images, etc...)
  • Rounding the properties of multiple items at once is supported!
